objects.draw

Class FactoryShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.draw.FactoryShape

  • public class FactoryShape
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents set of functions added to given Factory which allows to draw it in ImgPlane. This class is practically drawable shape of the given factory wth it's paths.
    Author:
    Martin Hamet
